notes: [Improved] Removed control panel section with tools
[Fixed] Fixed other dropdown and Matrix conflict
[Added] Added a new field type called Width that lets you define width of a block as well as left and right padding.
[Added] Added a Zendesk widget.
# Breaking Change
We no longer support Freshdesk.
[Added] Added a new field type called Default Number that mimics the behaviour of the normal Number field type but lets you set a default value.

[Added] Added a new field type called Dropdown (other) that lets you add an ‘other’ option to a dropdown field. When ‘other’ is selected another text input is shown to allow the user to enter something other than the standard options provided.
[Added] Added a new field type called Author Instructions that lets you output markdown instead of a field. Useful when you have a Matrix block that doesn’t have any fields.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where clearing all Tasks wouldn’t actually kill it, it would lie in wait and the next time a Task of the same name ran it would piggy back on that db row ...
[Improved] Made all the field types previewable.
[Fixed] Fixed a casing bug that would cause the Tools cp tab to error on some servers.
[Improved] Switched the Freshdesk icon from 'help' to 'mail'.
[Added] Added the `openInstructionLinksInNewWindow` config variable which when set to true will open all instruction links in new a window.
[Added] Added a freshdesk widget that opens in a new window.
[Added] Added a “Roll Your Own” widget that lets you assign a template to load from your site templates folder. Go nuts.
[Added] Added a cp section with some simplified tools in it (Clear Tasks, Clear Caches and Rebuild Search Indexes).
[Improved] Sorted out the changelog to be compatible with the `getReleaseFeedUrl()` method.
[Added] Added a new field type ‘Categories (multiple groups)’ that lets you select multiple groups in a Categories field.
[Fixed] Fixed disabled element fields not showing up in Live Preview and theoretically emptying their contents on save.
[Added] Added a disabled Entries field type.

[Fixed] Fixes a bug where all file downloads were generating a temporary file that never got deleted until someone cleared the temporary files from the settings page in the cp. Now any assets file in the temp folder that is over 24 hours old will be removed on the next `supercoolTools/downloadFile` request.
[Added] Added a controller action that clears the template caches.
[Fixed] Fixed an error with checking for the locale in the search input templates.
[Added] Added a fuzzy search field type for Categories.
[Fixed] Fixed the title search on EntriesSearch fields not being totally inclusive.
[Added] Added a disabled dropdown field type.
[Fixed] Fixed some re-naming issues.
[Added] Initial release.
